articles.author: Anna Heim
articles.title: How a Spanish virus brought Google to Málaga - TechCrunch
articles.description: Spanish entrepreneur Bernardo Quintero, whose company is at the root of Google's Málaga cybersecurity hub, identified the author of the computer virus that influenced his career.
articles.content: After 33 years, Bernardo Quintero decided it was time to find the person who changed his life — the anonymous programmer who created a computer virus that had infected his university decades earlier.… [+4036 chars]
